Function reference

Initialize storms

Functions for initializing storm/stormsList objects

stormsDataset-class stormsDataset
stormsDataset
defStormsDataset()
Creating a stormsDataset object
storm-class storm
storm object
stormsList-class stormsList
stormsList object
defStormsList()
Creating a stormsList object

Getters

Functions for getting data associated with storm/stormsList objects

getStorm()
Extracting a storm
getNames()
Getting the names of the storms
getSeasons()
Getting cyclonic seasons of the storms
getSSHS()
Getting maximum Saffir-Simpson hurricane wind scale category
getNbObs()
Getting the number of observations
getInObs()
Getting the number of the observations
getObs()
Getting observations
getNbStorms()
Getting the number of storm
getLOI()
Getting the location of interest
getBuffer()
Getting the buffered location of interest
getBufferSize()
Getting the buffer size

Compute products

Functions for computing products

spatialBehaviour()
Computing wind behaviour and summary statistics over given areas
temporalBehaviour()
Computing wind behaviour time series and summary statistics at given point locations

Plot

Functions for plotting tracks and products

plotStorms()
Plotting storm track data
plotBehaviour()
Plotting spatial wind behaviour

Write

Function for writing data in .GeoTiff or .nc format

writeRast()
Exporting rasters to GeoTIFF or NetCDF files

Data

Examples data provided by this package

eezNC
EEZ of New Caledonia
